title: New AI tool predicts risk of over 1,000 diseases in advance: Report
description: A new artificial intelligence (AI) tool is capable of predicting an individual’s risk of more than 1,000 diseases, in some instances projecting outcomes decades
content:
A new artificial intelligence (AI) tool is capable of predicting an individual’s risk of more than 1,000 diseases, in some instances projecting outcomes decades into the future, according to a recent study published on Wednesday.

title: Gen AI and Geoscience Research at EarthSense 2025
description: New Delhi [India], September 19: Hyderabad witnessed a defining moment in global research and innovation as KLH Aziz Nagar Campus proudly hosted the IEEE International Conference on Next-Gen Technologies of Artificial Intelligence and Geoscience Remote Sensing - EarthSense 2025. Held from 16th to 18th September 2025, the international gathering positioned KLH at the forefront of interdisciplinary collaboration, bringing together scientists, researchers, and industry leaders from around the world.

title: India picks 8 firms, including IIT Bombay, to build a massive 1-trillion parametre AI model
description: India’s artificial intelligence mission is moving into its next big phase. The government has named eight organisations, including IIT Bombay, Tech Mahindra and Fractal Analytics, to build foundational large language models (LLMs) under the IndiaAI Mission.

title: Trump's AI plan supports antitrust enforcement, DOJ official says
description: U.S. antitrust enforcers are on guard against anticompetitive behaviour in the artificial intelligence sector, a Department of Justice official said.
content:
U.S. antitrust enforcers are on guard against anticompetitive behaviour in the artificial intelligence sector as part of the Trump administration's plan to cement U.S. AI dominance, a Department of Justice official said in New York on Thursday.

title: SoftBank, OpenAI Japan AI joint venture is delayed
description: SoftBank’s plans to set up a joint venture with OpenAI to bring artificial intelligence services to corporate customers in Japan are significantly behind schedule.
content:
SoftBank's plans to set up a joint venture with OpenAI to bring artificial intelligence services to corporate customers in Japan are significantly behind schedule, according to a source familiar with the matter.

title: The new AirPods can translate languages in your ears. This is profound
description: The technology is one of the strongest examples yet of how artificial intelligence can be used in a seamless, practical way to improve people’s lives.
content: This week, I saw an old friend, and he caught me up on what he’d been up to over the summer. He and his girlfriend had visited family in Arizona. His niece dragged him to a screening of Lilo and Stitch. He was working hard at a new startup. He said a... [281 chars]

title: Google Brings 10 New AI Features to Chrome, Including Gemini Integration
description: Google announced on Thursday the rollout of 10 new artificial intelligence (AI) features in its Chrome browser, calling it the biggest upgrade in Chrome’s history. The updates include Gemini integration, AI-powered browsing assistance and expanded online safety protections, and will roll out gradually in English in the U.S. before expanding to more countries and languages.

title: IIT-Kanpur, Vietnam National University sign MoU to strengthen academic & research collaboration
description: Key areas identified for collaboration include: application of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in medical diagnosis and hospital implementation tailored for Vietnam, AI-driven education and research, including language learning technologies and others

title: China's DeepSeek says its hit AI model cost just US$294,000 to train

title: Korea Eases Equity Rules for Banks to Spur High-Tech Investment
description: South Korea rolled out measures aimed at redirecting bank funds from property lending to critical industries including semiconductors and artificial intelligence.
